structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.catch_line: Report to board of physician's address -- Notice of change of address.

text.section: Every physician who is practicing medicine or osteopathy in this state shall report to the board the address or addresses at which he maintains an office, and every new licensee shall make the same report within ninety (90) days after commencing the practice of medicine or osteopathy in this state.
Every physician who, after notifying the board of his official address or addresses, moves his office to a new address shall immediately notify the board of the change.

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 11, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 11(a), (b).
